name: main

definition.annotation: Performs functional enrichment analysis of gene sets using GOseq, identifying over-represented Gene Ontology terms and KEGG pathways. This workflow accounts for gene length bias in RNA-seq data when calculating enrichment statistics. Input requires differentially expressed genes and gene lengths. Generates comprehensive tables and visualizations of enriched GO terms across all three ontologies (Biological Process, Molecular Function, Cellular Component) as well as KEGG pathway enrichment results.
definition.name: Gene Ontology and KEGG Pathway Enrichment Analysis

readme:
# Gene Ontology and KEGG Pathway Enrichment Analysis

## Inputs dataset

The workflow need the following inputs:
- **The DEG file:**
    - A tabular file with first column the gene symbol and second column a boolean value whether the gene is a differentially expressed gene or not. 
- **The gene length file:**
    - A tabular file with first column the gene symbol and second column the gene length of the genes.
    - You can create this file with **[Gene length and GC content](https://usegalaxy.eu/?tool_id=toolshed.g2.bx.psu.edu%2Frepos%2Fiuc%2Flength_and_gc_content%2Flength_and_gc_content%2F0.1.2&version=latest)** tool. You will need a GTF file as input.
    - If you are using **[featureCounts](https://usegalaxy.eu/?tool_id=toolshed.g2.bx.psu.edu%2Frepos%2Fiuc%2Ffeaturecounts%2Ffeaturecounts%2F2.0.6%2Bgalaxy0&version=latest)** you can set `Create gene-length file` to yes and get gene length as separate output.
- **The KEGG file:**
    - A tabular file with first column the Pathway ID and second column the Pathway name like: 
        -   ```
            ID  Name
            01100   Metabolic pathways - mmus
            01200   Carbon metabolism - mmus 
            ```
    - You can get this information from the KEGG database. For example:
        - mouse: https://rest.kegg.jp/list/pathway/mmu
        - human: https://rest.kegg.jp/list/pathway/hsa
- **Genome:** Select one of the available genomes
- **Gene ID format:** Select the format of your input genes (Ensembl, Entrez, or Symbol)
## Processing

- The workflow will do a simple enrichment analysis with taking into account the gene length
- The output will be 3 files `GO table`, `Top ontology plot` and `DE genes in each category` for Cellular Component, Biological Processes, and Molecular Function ontologies and `KEGG table` and `DE genes in each KEGG Pathways`

## Contribution

@nilchia wrote the workflow and the tests.
changelog:
# Changelog

All notable changes to this workflow will be documented in this file.


## [0.1] - 2024-11-03

### Added
diagram_svg:
<svg xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" viewBox="0 0 1100 520" role="img" aria-label="GOseq GO and KEGG enrichment analysis workflow diagram">
  <title>Gene Ontology and KEGG Pathway Enrichment Analysis</title>
  <desc>Functional enrichment analysis using GOseq for three GO ontologies (Biological Process, Molecular Function, Cellular Component) and KEGG pathways, accounting for gene length bias in RNA-seq data</desc>

  <defs>
    <pattern id="grid" width="20" height="20" patternUnits="userSpaceOnUse">
      <path d="M 20 0 L 0 0 0 20" fill="none" stroke="#c5d5e4" stroke-width="0.5"/>
    </pattern>
    <pattern id="grid-major" width="100" height="100" patternUnits="userSpaceOnUse">
      <rect width="100" height="100" fill="url(#grid)"/>
      <path d="M 100 0 L 0 0 0 100" fill="none" stroke="#b0c4d8" stroke-width="1"/>
    </pattern>
    <style>
      .connection { stroke: #25537b; stroke-width: 4; fill: none; stroke-linecap: round; }
      .connection-qc { stroke: #25537b; stroke-width: 3; fill: none; stroke-linecap: round; stroke-dasharray: 5 3; }
      .connection-secondary { stroke: #25537b; stroke-width: 3; fill: none; stroke-linecap: round; }
      .node-card { filter: drop-shadow(1px 2px 3px rgba(0,0,0,0.15)); }
    </style>
  </defs>

  <!-- Background -->
  <rect width="1100" height="520" fill="#f8f9fa"/>
  <rect width="1100" height="520" fill="url(#grid-major)"/>

  <!-- Title bar -->
  <rect x="0" y="0" width="1100" height="45" fill="#25537b"/>
  <text x="20" y="28" font-family="system-ui, sans-serif" font-size="16" font-weight="600" fill="white">GOseq Enrichment</text>
  <text x="200" y="28" font-family="system-ui, sans-serif" font-size="12" fill="rgba(255,255,255,0.7)">GO and KEGG Pathway Enrichment Analysis</text>

  <!-- ==================== CONNECTIONS ==================== -->

  <!-- DE Results → goseq CC -->
  <path class="connection" d="M 200 135 C 310 135, 320 100, 430 100"/>

  <!-- DE Results → goseq BP -->
  <path class="connection" d="M 200 135 C 310 135, 320 195, 430 195"/>

  <!-- DE Results → goseq MF -->
  <path class="connection" d="M 200 155 C 310 195, 320 290, 430 290"/>

  <!-- DE Results → goseq KEGG -->
  <path class="connection" d="M 200 155 C 290 240, 320 385, 430 385"/>

  <!-- Gene Length → goseq CC -->
  <path class="connection-secondary" d="M 200 260 C 280 260, 320 115, 430 115"/>

  <!-- Gene Length → goseq BP -->
  <path class="connection-secondary" d="M 200 260 C 300 260, 350 210, 430 210"/>

  <!-- Gene Length → goseq MF -->
  <path class="connection-secondary" d="M 200 260 C 340 260, 380 305, 430 305"/>

  <!-- Gene Length → goseq KEGG -->
  <path class="connection-secondary" d="M 200 270 C 340 280, 380 400, 430 400"/>

  <!-- goseq CC → CC outputs -->
  <path class="connection" d="M 630 100 C 700 100, 710 100, 760 100"/>

  <!-- goseq BP → BP outputs -->
  <path class="connection" d="M 630 195 C 700 195, 710 195, 760 195"/>

  <!-- goseq MF → MF outputs -->
  <path class="connection" d="M 630 290 C 700 290, 710 290, 760 290"/>

  <!-- goseq KEGG → join → KEGG output -->
  <path class="connection" d="M 630 385 C 700 385, 710 385, 760 385"/>

  <!-- KEGG pathways → join -->
  <path class="connection-secondary" d="M 200 375 C 350 420, 700 415, 760 400"/>

  <!-- ==================== NODES ==================== -->

  <!-- NODE: DE Results (Input - Gold) -->
  <g class="node-card" transform="translate(20, 90)">
    <rect width="180" height="90" rx="4" fill="white" stroke="#ffd700" stroke-width="1.5"/>
    <rect width="180" height="28" rx="4" fill="#ffd700"/>
    <rect x="0" y="24" width="180" height="4" fill="#ffd700"/>
    <text x="10" y="19" font-family="system-ui, sans-serif" font-size="11" fill="rgba(44,49,67,0.6)">1:</text>
    <text x="26" y="19" font-family="system-ui, sans-serif" font-size="11" font-weight="600" fill="#2C3143">DE Results</text>
    <text x="90" y="55" text-anchor="middle" font-family="system-ui, sans-serif" font-size="10" fill="#495057">Gene + T/F column</text>
    <text x="90" y="72" text-anchor="middle" font-family="system-ui, sans-serif" font-size="9" fill="#868e96">Diff. expression calls</text>
    <circle cx="180" cy="45" r="6" fill="white" stroke="#ffd700" stroke-width="2"/>
    <circle cx="180" cy="65" r="6" fill="white" stroke="#ffd700" stroke-width="2"/>
  </g>

  <!-- NODE: Gene Lengths (Input - Gold) -->
  <g class="node-card" transform="translate(20, 215)">
    <rect width="180" height="90" rx="4" fill="white" stroke="#ffd700" stroke-width="1.5"/>
    <rect width="180" height="28" rx="4" fill="#ffd700"/>
    <rect x="0" y="24" width="180" height="4" fill="#ffd700"/>
    <text x="10" y="19" font-family="system-ui, sans-serif" font-size="11" fill="rgba(44,49,67,0.6)">2:</text>
    <text x="26" y="19" font-family="system-ui, sans-serif" font-size="11" font-weight="600" fill="#2C3143">Gene Lengths</text>
    <text x="90" y="55" text-anchor="middle" font-family="system-ui, sans-serif" font-size="10" fill="#495057">Gene + length column</text>
    <text x="90" y="72" text-anchor="middle" font-family="system-ui, sans-serif" font-size="9" fill="#868e96">For length bias correction</text>
    <circle cx="180" cy="45" r="6" fill="white" stroke="#ffd700" stroke-width="2"/>
    <circle cx="180" cy="55" r="6" fill="white" stroke="#ffd700" stroke-width="2"/>
  </g>

  <!-- NODE: KEGG Pathways (Input - Gold) -->
  <g class="node-card" transform="translate(20, 340)">
    <rect width="180" height="75" rx="4" fill="white" stroke="#ffd700" stroke-width="1.5"/>
    <rect width="180" height="28" rx="4" fill="#ffd700"/>
    <rect x="0" y="24" width="180" height="4" fill="#ffd700"/>
    <text x="10" y="19" font-family="system-ui, sans-serif" font-size="11" fill="rgba(44,49,67,0.6)">3:</text>
    <text x="26" y="19" font-family="system-ui, sans-serif" font-size="11" font-weight="600" fill="#2C3143">KEGG Pathways</text>
    <text x="90" y="55" text-anchor="middle" font-family="system-ui, sans-serif" font-size="10" fill="#495057">Pathway ID + Name</text>
    <text x="90" y="68" text-anchor="middle" font-family="system-ui, sans-serif" font-size="9" fill="#868e96">For KEGG annotation</text>
    <circle cx="180" cy="35" r="6" fill="white" stroke="#ffd700" stroke-width="2"/>
  </g>

  <!-- NODE: goseq CC (Processing - Blue) -->
  <g class="node-card" transform="translate(430, 65)">
    <rect width="200" height="70" rx="4" fill="white" stroke="#25537b" stroke-width="1"/>

    <text x="100" y="52" text-anchor="middle" font-family="system-ui, sans-serif" font-size="10" fill="#495057">Cellular Component</text>

  </g>

  <!-- NODE: goseq BP (Processing - Blue) -->

  </g>
